attributes.action: Allow the final 2 hunted contestants another try at a fair extraction.
attributes.additional_details:
Watch the last episode of hunted.. 
To many chance hits on cctv.. 
Should of been called HUNTED THE FAIRY TALE ENDING..
attributes.background: Channel 4 produced the most rigged television event of the year to date.. a helicopter extraction in Birmingham.. rigging a competition which isn't allowed.. after 28 days the 2 guys left should be entitled to a fair chance of winning not that disgraceful excuse channel 4 came up with.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
